subject: Hi! I wanted to share our new GROW 25 playbook with you.
description_text:
Hope you’re well. I wanted to share our new Playbook, GROW 25 - The Importance of persona/b with you.

Hi Atto,

Hope you’re well.

I wanted to share our new Playbook, GROW 25 - The Importance of persona/b with you. This ebook, written by ecommerce experts explores how technology is reshaping roles, redefining consumer expectations, and accelerating change faster than ever, but why humans should always be at the forefront.

What’s inside?

- People + AI in Product Discovery: How human creativity and AI combine to create more personalised ecommerce experiences
- A/B Testing and Optimisation: Understanding the difference between testing and true optimisation, and how brands can refine discovery experiences for higher ROI
- Accessibility as a Growth Strategy: Why inclusive design and digital accessibility aren’t just ethical imperatives - they’re commercial advantages that drive loyalty and reach
- Pricing Science in Action: How data-driven optimisation uncovers the most profitable pricing sweet spots, beyond the limits of traditional A/B testing

Packed with insights, human-centered strategies, and data-driven examples, this playbook will help you personalise smarter and connect deeper.

Get your copy >
(https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VWg7Yw6qfdNwW7tDxDm9lqklQW4xGMq_5Fy14rN5GS5RbcPmD2W50lYqz6lZ3n5N7mHrJCszcSfW2DLFtF68SK-hW98Z3fM6VC23PW8b259K1wK41PW82mp6_1wfNmKVr4Gsh12-FxTW4P9lBY39m59WW1VQVlb7tNFvJW2XVl797mjqvsW6ghVMs7NgSV7W20NdVd20Xxs7VNd2xS4LLbS4N1P9ysl298-HW6xXshz8368kgW4j7Z_n7KjK6GN747Zk_XMw31W2rbRfD4GrQt_W8HhPCK6jVMW-W53fLFQ4LkbGCW3LwLPx2-LqXMW7fYmQF1Xzh-vW4vPSKy872b4QW5-GHz53xkmNSW8llmg84h_mLMW4d6zC31drNFyW85gZPV1CNnSrW84MxHt2-Pk5kN4C-_nNYGKnxW6yr3Mt5ZTvNxW2z48V95KmqkWW4tftxz97R9DkVwYrKj8cdxp8W91xZ6Q68JYcQW6kSfFv2MxX3JW7q-wkV2l5_64W4zNZ-576Km7wW6Q-k6C2Ph1N6W4dPVyJ2_Y9nJMhnbvWnDl79W2xzRvj5HZ631N6xc3FcMyw20W3Q-Pmv3GWhnWW1CBQr-3JBVkKW5Ng-0L2Xp6yyVsdY374HQByVW37xJcQ5yFyjrW3Rt_6j9bbFh2W44k4Zh5L0qF9W2msSJR7z32x6N6NJ5PCBSfn1Vrz0fz5pZwdKW3DDF0n7tVkH6W7ddnN16sq2bgW4mTW776-xlPfW7_lLG83m_dyvW87ZzCg21Y4YdW89R6qh2djtHNW8nZrcB6q9K35W2PFjL_4ttDfpVQnWvg2W7rMSW8Xh7_13Y1fC2W6mfqJQ43--yVW4rlMrT7vNS0FW8BjJCz7YmmWRW7wcd0s4x3twZW1rG8kC73drlRW64K4sg4tv0kPW1_KVB08FP-fJW54h5Qb1l2Ng0N6Sv_hkkwjPnW25G3bR4w-bFBW2qHVXX4sndBYVcjYTp8kGfGBN1B7xpZyC168W5MnmX43ctkGkW5_dJKz8SQVNZW36z_-Y8xqX01W5jXStr4z-p32W8kkB9f260pN_N2zFQM1gPst_f8zSVjR04 )
